verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> that <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1320>teachers;<s%> <S%G5037>as<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> that was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3526>Niger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3066>Lucius<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3127>Manaen,<s%> which had been brought up <S%G4939>with<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5076>tetrarch,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul.<s%>

As <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3008>ministered<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3522>fasted,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G873>Separate<s%> <S%G1211><s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> I have <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G5119>when<s%> they had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them,<s%> they sent them <S%G630>away.<s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3778>they,<s%> <S%G3303>being<s%> sent <S%G1599>forth<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2718>departed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4581>Seleucia;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4529>Salamis,<s%> they <S%G2605>preached<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> to their <S%G5257>minister.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had gone <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3520>isle<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos,<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3097>sorcerer,<s%> a false <S%G5578>prophet,<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was Barjesus: <S%G919><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> deputy of the <S%G446>country,<s%> <S%G4588>Sergius<s%> <S%G3972>Paulus,<s%> a <S%G4908>prudent<s%> <S%G435>man;<s%> <S%G3778>who<s%> called <S%G4341>for<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> and <S%G1934>desired<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1681>Elymas<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3097>sorcerer<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> is his name by <S%G3177>interpretation)<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3686><s%> <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to turn <S%G1294>away<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G446>deputy<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> <S%G3588>(who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is called <S%G3972>Paul,)<s%> <S%G4130>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> set his <S%G816>eyes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

And <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>subtlety<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4468>mischief,<s%> thou <S%G5207>child<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> thou <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> wilt thou <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G1294>pervert<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G991>seeing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G891>for<s%> a <S%G2540>season.<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> there <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G887>mist<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4655>darkness;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> some to lead him by the <S%G5497>hand.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G446>deputy,<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> what was <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> being <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and his <S%G4012>company<s%> <S%G321>loosed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%> in <S%G3828>Pamphylia:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G672>departing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1330>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> they <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> in <S%G4099>Pisidia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and sat <S%G2523>down.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G320>reading<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> rulers of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Ye <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5213><s%> any <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> say <S%G3004>on.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> stood <S%G450>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2678>beckoning<s%> with his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye that <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> give <S%G191>audience.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5312>exalted<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> they dwelt as <S%G3940>strangers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> a <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G1023>arm<s%> <S%G1806>brought<s%> he <S%G846>them<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of forty <S%G5063>years<s%> suffered he their <S%G5159>manners<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G2507>destroyed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G5477>Canaan,<s%> he divided their land to them by <S%G2624>lot.<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1093><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto them <S%G2923>judges<s%> about the space <S%G5613>of<s%> four <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

And <S%G2547>afterward<s%> they <S%G154>desired<s%> a <S%G935>king:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4549>Saul<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2797>Kish,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin,<s%> by the space of <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G3179>removed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he raised <S%G1453>up<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> to be their <S%G1519>king;<s%> <S%G935><s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he gave <S%G3140>testimony,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> mine <S%G3450>own<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G4160>fulfil<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2307>will.<s%>

Of <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5127>man's<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> hath <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> unto <S%G2474>Israel<s%> a <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

When <S%G2491>John<s%> had first <S%G4296>preached<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1529>coming<s%> <S%G4383><s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> his <S%G1408>course,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Whom<s%> <S%G5282>think<s%> ye that <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1511>am?<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> he. <S%G235>But,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>cometh<s%> one <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> of his <S%G4228>feet<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>loose.<s%>

Men <S%G435><s%> and <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G1085>stock<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> whosoever <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5399>feareth<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G649>sent.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers,<s%> because they knew him <S%G50>not,<s%> <S%G5126><s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> yet <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> which are <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G3956><s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day,<s%> they have <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> them in <S%G2919>condemning<s%> him.

And <S%G2532><s%> though they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> in him, yet <S%G154>desired<s%> they <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> should be <S%G337>slain.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> that was <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they took him <S%G2507>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3586>tree,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> him <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G3419>sepulcher.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the dead: <S%G3498><s%>

And <S%G3739>he<s%> was <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> of them which came up <S%G4872>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> declare unto you glad <S%G2097>tidings,<s%> <S%G5209><s%> how that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> which was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>fathers,<s%>

<S%G3754><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1603>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G5026>same<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> in that he hath raised up Jesus <S%G450>again;<s%> <S%G2424><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5568>psalm,<s%> <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> have <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as concerning <S%G3754>that<s%> he raised him <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> now no <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G3195>to<s%> <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1312>corruption,<s%> he <S%G2046>said<s%> on this <S%G3779>wise,<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4103>sure<s%> <S%G3741>mercies<s%> of <S%G1138>David.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> psalm, Thou shalt <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1325>suffer<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> Holy <S%G3741>One<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1312>corruption.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1138>David,<s%> after <S%G3303>he<s%> had <S%G5256>served<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1012>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> fell on <S%G2837>sleep,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G4369>laid<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> corruption: <S%G1312><s%>
